replies.body:
Has anyone found out the exact time?
NEEEEEEEED TO KNOW{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
What is the exact time{{item:3157}} for which the new season starts? i need to know {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} {{sticker:sg-janna}} plez help
do we know an exact time on when it starts like early morning 1-3am or like 5 to 6

finally i can use up my 14 keys
14 KEYS
IT HAS BEEN 2 ****ING MONTHS AND I NEVER GOT A SINGLE CHEST
pretty happy now :D
yay now I can build my stockpile of chests even more without any hope of ever opening all of them because key fragments never drop anymore. feelsbadman.
